projects.name: Mobile Device Management
projects.description: Monolithic Nest.js backend with secure authentication, UPI mandate handling, and remote device lock/unlock enforcement. Enabled fintech platform for EMI sales, loan repayments, and remote device management.

projects.name: Data-Extraction-System
projects.description: Monolithic Nest.js backend handles OCR, regex-based field extraction, and secure Gmail SMTP via OAuth2. Sharp and Tesseract.js pipeline processes PDFs/Images for high-accuracy text extraction. Optimized frontend built with Next.js.
